product_name: The North Face Denali Fleece Hoodie Jacket - Toddler Boys'
long_description: The North Face Denali Hoodie jacket is sure to be a cold-weather favorite. It offers stylish protection from the elements, straightforward comfort and durability for wintry fun. Exceptionally warm, recycled heavyweight Polartec(R) 300 Series fleece is treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish to shed water. Abrasion-resistant, 2-ply nylon reinforcements on upper body, elbows and hood provide extra durability and weather resistance. Elastic-bound hood, cuffs and hem help seal in warmth. The North Face Denali Hoodie features zippered hand pockets.
short_description: The North Face Denali Hoodie jacket is sure to be a cold-weather favorite. It offers stylish protection from the elements, straightforward comfort and durability for wintry fun.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Infants And Toddlers
product_group: Infants And Toddlers Fleece Jackets And Pants
